---

A patchwork of [humanoid](/Traits.aspx?ID=628) flesh makes up a _skinsaw mask_, which is stitched together with black silk or wire. It is distinctive for its bulbous orange eye—crafted from a magical glass bauble—and wide row of teeth. When worn, the mask amplifies your ability to sense fear in other creatures. You know the value of the [frightened](/Conditions.aspx?ID=76) condition of any observed creature, and you gain a +1 item bonus to [Perception](/Rules.aspx?ID=2298) checks to [Seek](/Actions.aspx?ID=2301) frightened creatures. Whenever you deal precision damage to a frightened creature, you deal 1 additional precision damage. If you aren’t [unholy](/Traits.aspx?ID=521), you are [drained](/Conditions.aspx?ID=68) 2 while wearing a _skinsaw mask_.
